attributes.action: Not enter the European Constitution without a Referendum
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain should not enter the European Constitution without Mr Blair consulting the future Prime Minister and the rest of Britain.  Britain will lose its identity and will have no power to veto decisions made by a reformed European Parliament.  Once the Declaration on the Future of Europe is signed, there will be no turning back and no room for renegotiation on any European treaties.  Let Britain remain as Britain.  Listen to the people.  We do not want to be ruled by Europe.  We have done very well, for hundreds of years, on our own.  Please, Mr Blair, don't leave us this way.  The least Mr Blair could do is put this forward for Public Referendum.  Let the people decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
